results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages complete trust in God's guidance.
results.reflection: Trusting in God's wisdom leads to a straight path in life.

results.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
results.reason: Acknowledges trust in God during times of fear.
results.reflection: Trusting God dispels fear and brings peace.

results.text: Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord God is an everlasting rock.
results.reason: Highlights God's unwavering nature as a foundation of trust.
results.reflection: God's unchanging nature is a solid rock on which to place our trust.

results.text: Commit your way to the Lord; trust in him, and he will act.
results.reason: Emphasizes trusting God and His actions.
results.reflection: Trusting in God's timing and plan leads to His perfect outcomes.

results.text: Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe.
results.reason: Contrasts trust in God with fear of man's opinions.
results.reflection: Choosing trust in God over human approval brings security and protection.
